title: BRIEF-Premier Fishing Says Expects EPS For Year Ending Aug 31 2019 Between 17.31 And 20.46 Cents Per Share
text:
BRIEF-Premier Fishing Says Expects EPS For Year Ending Aug 31 2019 Between 17.31 And 20.46 Cents Per Share

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 25, 2019 17:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Premier Fishing Says Expects EPS For Year Ending Aug 31 2019 Between 17.31 And 20.46 Cents Per Share Oct 25 (Reuters) - Premier Fishing and Brands Ltd : * TRADING STATEMENT * FISHING INDUSTRY AS A WHOLE EXPERIENCED A CHALLENGING OPERATING ENVIRONMENT * GROUP EXPECTS EARNINGS PER SHARE FOR YEAR ENDING 31 AUGUST 2019 OF BETWEEN 17.31 AND 20.46 CENTS PER SHARE * SEES BASIC EPS FOR YEAR ENDING 31 AUGUST 2019 OF BETWEEN 17.31 AND 20.46 CENTS PER SHARE * EBITDA EXPECTED TO INCREASE AS COMPARED TO PRIOR YEAR * SEES "HEPS FOR YEAR ENDING 31 AUGUST 2019 OF BETWEEN 15.48 AND 18.64 CENTS PER SHARE

BRIEF-Premier Fishing Says Expects EPS For Year Ending Aug 31 2019 Between 17.31 And 20.46 Cents Per Share
